    • Constructor Detail

      • TransactionId

        public TransactionId()

        Default Constructor.

        Create a new Xid with DEFAULT_FORMAT using System.nanoTime() as transaction id and Thread.currentThread().getId() as branch qualifier

      • TransactionId

        public TransactionId(int formatId,
                     long globalTransactionId,
                     long branchQualifier)

        Constructor.

        Create a new Xid with given format, transaction id and branch qualifier
        Parameters:
        formatId - int Format Id.
        globalTransactionId - long Transaction Id
        branchQualifier - long Branch Qualifier
